process_component_button ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'component_button'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 93 of file button_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'icon' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'component_button' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'label' , 'label' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'size' , '42' );
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'component_button.tpl' );
                              $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
                              
                              $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
                              $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                              $PathToPackage = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
                              $Icon = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'icon' );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{path_to_image}' , $PathToPackage."/res/images/$Icon" , $Template );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{component_button:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 151 of file button_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'icon' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'menu_button' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $Label = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'label' , 'label' );
                              $Icon = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'icon' );
                              $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' , 'last' );
                              $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                              $Size = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'size' , 24 );
                              
                              $PathToPackage = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
                              
                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/menu_button.tpl' );
                              
                              $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{path_to_image}' , $PathToPackage."/res/images/$Icon" , $Template );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{label}' , $Label , $Template );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{size}' , $Size , $Template );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{package_version}' , $PackageVersion , $Template );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{menu_button:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 215 of file button_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'toolbar_button' , array( 'icon' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              $Title = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' , '' );
                              $Icon = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'icon' );
                              $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
                              $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                              $Size = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'size' , 32 );
                              $Permit = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'permit' , 'admin' );
                              
                              $PathToPackage = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
                              
                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'toolbar_button.tpl' );
                              
                              $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{path_to_image}' , $PathToPackage."/res/images/$Icon" , $Template );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{title}' , $Title , $Template );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{size}' , $Size , $Template );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{package_version}' , $PackageVersion , $Template );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{permit}' , $Permit , $Template );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{toolbar_button:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
